function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Encouragement of telemedicine service instead of visiting clinics","Impact":"Reduction in physical visits to health centers, potential decrease in disease detection and control","Mitigation":"Promote regular health check-ups, increase access to remote health monitoring tools","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, remote monitoring devices","People":"Community members, patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Small health centers not attending COVID-19 patients directly","Impact":"Potential decreased capacity to handle COVID-19 cases at smaller health centers","Mitigation":"Establish clear referral pathways to specialized COVID-19 treatment centers, provide adequate training and resources for COVID-19 management","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms for consultation, personal protective equipment (PPE) for staff","People":"Patients seeking healthcare at small centers, healthcare providers at small centers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Historical average energy use decrease due to lockdown measures","Impact":"Changes in building usage patterns may affect indoor air quality and environmental conditions, impacting occupant health and comfort","Mitigation":"Implement HVAC system adjustments for reduced occupancy, improve ventilation and air filtration systems, promote good indoor air quality practices","Technologies":"Smart HVAC controls, air quality monitoring sensors, advanced air filtration systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, building owners","Owner":"Property management, facility maintenance teams"}]}
